conversations.body_text:
Greetings, 



Is it possible to exclude the brackets I added and include these on the 
screenshot?




Thanks you, have a nice day

PR

---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: patrikry@seznam.cz
Komu: SIMSONN
Hi Patrikry,    Alright, we've updated your address and switched you to the older mounting bracket model.

Hi,



sorry for the hickups :D can we switch back to the newer mounting brackets? 




Thank you for a quick send

PR
---------- Původní e‑mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
Hi Patrikry,    Alright, we've notified the warehouse, but we're not sure if the package has been processed yet.
